GE07bhg4c05u:1: arjuna uvāca saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:2: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam ||1||
GE07bhg4c05u:5: jitendriyasya ca yateḥ pañcame muktim abravīt ||
GE07bhg4c05u:6: ajñāna-sambhūtaṃ saṃśayaṃ jñānāsinā chittvā karma-yogam ātiṣṭha ity uktam
GE07bhg4c05u:7: | tatra pūrvāpara-virodhaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca saṃnyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:8: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha ity ādinā ca
GE07bhg4c05u:10: jñānāsinā saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogam ātiṣṭha iti punar yogaṃ ca kathayasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:11: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ viruddha-svarūpatvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:12: tasmād etayor madhya ekasminn anuṣṭhātavye sati mama yac chreyaḥ suniścitam tad ekaṃ brūhi
GE07bhg4c05u:16: tṛtīye 'dhyāye jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te ity ādinārjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavān jñāna-karmaṇor vikalpa-samuccayāsambhavenādhikāri-bheda-vyavasthayā
GE07bhg4c05u:17: 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha ity ādinā nirṇayaṃ kṛtavān |
GE07bhg4c05u:18: tathā cājñādhikārikaṃ karma na jñānena saha samuccīyate tejas-timirayor
GE07bhg4c05u:22: jñāna-kāryasyājñāna-nāśasya karmaṇā kartum aśakyatvāt tam eva viditvāpi
GE07bhg4c05u:23: mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'nāyanāya iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:24: jñāne jāte tu karma-kāryaṃ nāpekṣyata evety uktaṃ yāvān artha udapāne ity atra |
GE07bhg4c05u:25: tathā ca jñāninaḥ karmānadhikāre niścite prārabdha-karma-vaśād
GE07bhg4c05u:26: vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa tad-anuṣṭhānaṃ vā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso veti nirvivādaṃ caturthe nirṇītam
GE07bhg4c05u:27: ajñena tv antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvārā jñānotpattaye karmāṇy anuṣṭheyāni tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena
GE07bhg4c05u:29: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:31: tathā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso 'pi jñānārthaḥ śrūyate etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti, śānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet, tyajataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ tyuktuḥ pratyak
GE07bhg4c05u:32: paraṃ padam, satyānṛte sukha-duḥkhe vedān imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca parityajyātmānam anvicchet ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c05u:34: prayājāvaghātayor iva na samuccayaḥ sambhavati viruddhatvena yaugapadyābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:39: | karmaṇo hi pāpa-kṣaya-rūpam adṛṣṭam eva dvāraṃ, saṃnyāsasya tu sarva-vikṣepābhāvena vicārāvasara-dāna-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam eva dvāram |
GE07bhg4c05u:40: niyamāpūrvaṃ tu dṛṣṭa-samavāyitvād avaghātādāv iva na prayojakam |
GE07bhg4c05u:54: | tathā coktam - na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:56: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:57: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate || [Gītā 6.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:61: brahmāvāptyai tu tat-tyāga īpsantīti śruter balāt || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:63: kaṣāya-paṅktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:64: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:66: kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā ca śreṇī-sthāneṣu ca triṣu |
GE07bhg4c05u:67: pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ pārivrājyam anuttamam ||
GE07bhg4c05u:70: tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:71: triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet paramābhīpsitaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:74: tathā ca śrutiḥ - brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhaved gṛhād vanī bhūtvā pravrajed yadi
GE07bhg4c05u:75: vetarathā brahmacaryād eva pravrajed gṛhād vā vanād vā yad ahar eva virajet tad ahar eva pravrajet iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:78: viraktatā-daśāyāṃ saṃnyāsaḥ śravaṇādy-avasara-dānena jñānārthaṃ iti daśā-bhedenājñam adhikṛtyaiva karma-tat-tyāgau vyākhyātuṃ pañcama-ṣaṣṭhāv
GE07bhg4c05u:80: vidvat-saṃnyāsas tu jñāna-balād artha-siddha eveti sandehābhāvān na vicāryate |
GE07bhg4c05u:81: tatraikam eva jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati jñānārthatvena karma-tat-tyāgayor
GE07bhg4c05u:82: vigdhānāt tayoś ca viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhānāsambhavān mayā jijñāsunā kim idānīm anuṣṭheyam iti sandihāno 'rjuna uvāca saṃnyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:85: yāvaj-jīvādi-śruti-vihitānāṃ nityānāṃ naimittikānāṃ ca saṃnyāsaṃ tyāgaṃ jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati kathayasi veda-mukhena punas tad-viruddhaṃ yogaṃ ca karmānuṣṭhāna-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:86: etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti, tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena ity
GE07bhg4c05u:89: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvann āpnoti kilbiṣam || [Gītā 4.21]
GE07bhg4c05u:90: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata iti gītā-vākya-dvayena
GE07bhg4c05u:92: tatraikam ajñaṃ prati karma-tat-tyāgayor vidhānād yugapad ubhayānuṣṭhānasambhavād etayoḥ karma-tat-tyāgayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyaḥ praśasyataraṃ manyase karma vā tat-tyāgaṃ vā tan me brūhi suniścitaṃ tava
GE07bhg4c05u:95: proktaṃ jñānād api śreṣṭhaṃ karma tad-dāṛḍhya-siddhaye |
GE07bhg4c05u:96: tat-padārthasya ca jñānaṃ sāmyād yā api pañcame ||
GE07bhg4c05u:97: pūrvādhyāyānte śrutena vākya-dvāreṇa virodham āśaṅkamānaḥ pṛcchati
GE07bhg4c05u:101: iti vākyena tvaṃ karma-yogenotpanna-jñānasya karma-saṃnyāsaṃ brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c05u:104: ity anena punas tasyaiva karma-yogaṃ ca brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c05u:106: karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ, sthiti-gativat
GE07bhg4c05u:108: tasmāj jñānī karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kuryāt, karma-yogaṃ vā kuryād iti tvad-abhiprāyam anavagato |haṃ pṛcchāmi etayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyas tvayā suniścitam tan me brūhi ||1||
GE07bhg4c05u:111: śuddhasya tad-akartṛtvaṃ tvety ādi prāha pañcame ||
GE07bhg4c05u:112: dvitīye mumukṣuṃ praty ātma-vijñānaṃ mocakam abhidhāya tad-upāyayā
GE07bhg4c05u:114: labdha-vijñānasya na kiṃcit karmāstīti yas tv ātma-ratir eva syāt iti tṛtīye, sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha iti caturthe cāvādīt |
GE07bhg4c05u:116: ity ādinā tasyaiva punaḥ karma-yogaṃ prāvocat |
GE07bhg4c05u:118: he kṛṣṇa ! karmaṇāṃ sannyāsaṃ sarvendriya-vyāpāra-virati-rūpaṃ jñāna-yogam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:119: punar yogaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ca sarvendriya-vyāpāra-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:120: na caikasya yugapat tau sambhavetāṃ, sthiti-gativat tamas-tejovac ca viruddha-svarūpatvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:121: tasmāl labdha-jñānaḥ karma sannyased anutiṣṭhed veti bhavad-abhimataṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:123: etayoḥ karma-sannyāsa-karmānuṣṭhānayor yad ekaṃ śreyas tvayā suniścitaṃ tattvaṃ me brūhīti
GE07bhg4c05u:125: śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca niḥśreyasa-karāv ubhau |
GE07bhg4c05u:127: śrīdharaḥ : atrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:128: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na hi vedānta-vedyātma-tattvajñaṃ prati karma-yogam ahaṃ bravīmi |
GE07bhg4c05u:131: bandhu-vadhādi-nimitta-śoka-mohādi-kṛtam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ dehātma-viveka-jñānāsinā chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam
GE07bhg4c05u:133: karma-yogena śuddha-cittasyātma-tattva-jñāne jāte sati tat-paripākārthaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṅgatvena saṃnyāsaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:134: evaṃ saty aṅga-pradhānayor vikalpa-yogāt saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś cety etāv ubhāv api
GE07bhg4c05u:136: tathāpi tu tayor madhye tu karma-saṃnyāsāt sakāśāt karma-yogo viśiṣṭo bhavatīti ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:137: madhusūdanaḥ : evam arjunasya praśne tad-uttaram śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:139: tayos tu karma-saṃnyāsād anadhikāri-kṛtāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate śreyān adhikāra-sampādakatvena
GE07bhg4c05u:140: viśvanāthaḥ : karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti jñāninaḥ karma-karaṇe na ko 'pi
GE07bhg4c05u:142: pratyuta niṣkāma-karmaṇā citta-śuddhi-dārḍhyāj jñāna-dārḍhyam eva syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:143: saṃnyāsinas tu kadācit citta-vaiguṇye sati tad-upaśamanārthaṃ kiṃ karma niṣiddham ? jñānābhyāsa-pratibandhakaṃ tu citta-vaiguṇyam eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:144: viṣaya-grahaṇe tu vāntāśitvam eva syād iti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:145: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:149: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na khalu labdha-jñānasyāpi karma-yogo doṣāvahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:153: karma-sannyāsinas tu citta-doṣe sati tad-doṣa-vināśāya karmānuṣṭheyaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:155: karma-tyāga-vākyāni tv ātmani ratau satyāṃ karmāṇi taṃ svayaṃ tjayantīty āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:159: jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati |
GE07bhg4c05u:160: nirdvandvo hi mahā-bāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:161: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃnyāsitvena karma-yoginaṃ stuvaṃs tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ darśayati jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:162: rāga-dveṣādi-rāhityena parameśvarārthaṃ karmāṇi yo 'nutiṣṭhati sa nityaṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi saṃnyāsīty evaṃ jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:163: tatra hetuḥ nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣādi-dvandva-śūnyo hi śuddha-citto
GE07bhg4c05u:164: jñāna-dvārā sukham anāyāsenaiva bandhāt saṃsārāt pramucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:165: madhusūdanaḥ : tam eva karma-yogaṃ stauti jñeya iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:166: sa karmaṇi pravṛtto 'pi nityaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:170: nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣa-rahito hi yasmāt sukham anāyāsena he mahābāho bandhād antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-rūpāj jñāna-pratibandhāt pramucyate
GE07bhg4c05u:172: viśvanāthaḥ : na ca sannyāsa-prāpyo mokṣo 'kṛta-saṃnyāsenaiva tena na prāpya iti vācyam ity āha jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:175: he mahābāho iti mukti-nagarīṃ jetuṃ sa eva
GE07bhg4c05u:177: baladevaḥ : kuto viśiṣyate tatrāha jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:182: karmāntargatātmānubhavānanda-paritṛptas tato 'nyat kiṃcit na kāṅkṣati na ca dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c05u:183: nirdvandvo dvandva-sahiṣṇuḥ sukham anāyāsena sukara-karma-niṣṭhayety arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:185: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:186: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:189: ato vikalpam aṅgīkṛtyobhayoḥ kaḥ śreṣṭha iti praśno
GE07bhg4c05u:191: na vivekinām ity āha sāṅkhya-yogāv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:193: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau eka-phalau santau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālā ajñā eva pravadanti na tu paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:194: tatra hetuḥ - anayor ekam apy samyag āsthita āśritavān ubhayor api phalam āpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:195: tathā hi karma-yogaṃ samyag anutiṣṭhan śuddha-cittaḥ san jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindati |
GE07bhg4c05u:196: saṃnyāsaṃ samyag āsthito 'pi pūrvam anuṣṭhitasya karma-yogasyāpi
GE07bhg4c05u:197: paramparayā jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindatīti na pṛthak phalatvam anayor ity arthaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:198: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu yaḥ karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñātavyaḥ karma-tat-tyāgayoḥ svarūpa-virodhāt phalaikyāt tatheti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c05u:200: tathā ca niḥśreyasa-karāv ubhāv ity anupapannam ity āśaṅkyāha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:201: saṃkhyā samyag ātma-buddhis tāṃ vahatīti jñānāntaraṅga-sādhanatayā sāṅkhyaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:205: kiṃ tarhi paṇḍitānāṃ matam ? ucyate - ekam apy saṃnyāsa-karmaṇor madhye samyag āsthitaḥ svādhikārānurūpeṇa samyag yathā-śāstraṃ kṛtavān sann ubhayor
GE07bhg4c05u:206: vindate phalam jñānotpatti-dvāreṇa niḥśreyasam ekam eva ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:207: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmād yac chreya evaitayor iti tvad-uktam api vastuto na
GE07bhg4c05u:209: vivekibhir ubhayoḥ pārthakyābhāvasya dṛṣṭatvād ity āha
GE07bhg4c05u:212: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālāḥ vadanti, na tu vijñāḥ jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:214: baladevaḥ : yaḥ śreya etayor ekam iti tvad-vākyaṃ ca na ghaṭata ity āha sāṃkhyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:215: jñāna-yoga-karma-yogau phala-bhedāt pṛthag-bhūtāv iti bālāḥ pravadanti, na tu paṇḍitāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:216: ataeva ekam ity ādi phalam ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇam ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:218: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:219: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:220: śrīdharaḥ : etad eva sphuṭayati yat sāṃkhyair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:222: jñāna-niṣṭhaiḥ saṃnyāsibhir yat sthānaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa sākṣād
GE07bhg4c05u:223: avāpyate, yogair ity ārśa āditvān matv-arthīyo 'c-pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:224: tena karma-yogibhir api tad eva jñāna-dvāreṇa gamyate 'vāpyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:225: ataḥ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca ekaphalatvena ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati
GE07bhg4c05u:226: madhusūdanaḥ : ekasyānuṣṭhānāt katham ubhayoḥ phalaṃ vindate tathāha yat sāṃkhyair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:229: saṃskṛtāntaḥ-karaṇaiḥ śravaṇādi-pūrvikayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā yat prasiddhaṃ sthānaṃ tiṣṭhaty evāsmin na tu kadāpi cyavata iti vyutpattyā mokṣākhyaṃ prāpyata āvaraṇābhāva-mātreṇa labhyata iva nitya-prāptatvāt, yogair api bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā phalābhisandhi-rāhityena kṛtāni karmāṇi śāstrīyāṇi
GE07bhg4c05u:230: yogās te yeṣāṃ santi te 'pi yogāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:233: jñāna-niṣṭhayā vartamāne bhaviṣyati vā janmani sampatsyamānayā tat sthānaṃ gamyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:234: ata eka-phalatvād ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa eva
GE07bhg4c05u:236: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yeṣāṃ saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:240: yāny ato 'nyāni janmāni teṣu nūnaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet |
GE07bhg4c05u:241: yat kṛtyaṃ puruṣeṇeha nānyathā brahmaṇi sthitiḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:242: evaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena bhāvinī saṃnyāsa-pūrvajñāna-niṣṭhānumīyate sāmagryāḥ kāryāvyabhicāritvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:245: sa tu vairāgya-tīvratāyāṃ svayam eva bhaviṣyatīti ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:246: viśvanāthaḥ : etad eva spaṣṭayati yad iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:251: api yo vivekenaikam eva paśyati sa paśyati, cakṣuṣmān paṇḍita ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:257: ataeva tad dvayaṃ nivṛtti-pravṛtti-rūpatayā bhinna-rūpam api phalaikyād ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati vetti, sa paśyati sa cakṣuṣmān paṇḍita ity arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:259: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:261: śrīdharaḥ : yadi karma-yogino 'py antataḥ saṃnyāsenaiva jñāna-nisṭhā tarhy ādita eva saṃnyāsaḥ kartuṃ yukta iti manvānaṃ praty āha saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:262: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā saṃnyāso duḥkham āptum duḥkha-hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:268: ataś citta-śuddheḥ prāk karma-yoga eva saṃnyāsād viśiṣyata iti pūrvoktaṃ siddham |
GE07bhg4c05u:272: madhusūdanaḥ : aśuddhāntaḥkaraṇenāpi saṃnyāsa eva prathamaṃ kuto na
GE07bhg4c05u:273: kriyate jñāna-niṣṭhā-hetutvena tasyāvaśakatvād iti cet tatrāha saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:274: ayogato yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śodhakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ karmāntareṇa haṭhād
GE07bhg4c05u:275: eva yaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ sa tu duḥkham āptum eva bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:277: śodhake ca karmaṇy anadhikārāt karma-brahmobhaya-bhraṣṭatvena parama-saṅkaṭāpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:278: karma-yoga-yuktas tu śuddhāntaḥkaraṇatvān munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvā brahma satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ na cireṇa śīghram evādhigacchati sākṣātkaroti pratibandhakābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:281: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati || [Gītā 3.4] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:282: ata eka-phalatve 'pi karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad upapannam
GE07bhg4c05u:283: viśvanāthaḥ : kintu samyak-citta-śuddhim anirdhārayato jñāninaḥ saṃnyāso
GE07bhg4c05u:284: duḥkhadaḥ karma-yogas tu sukhada eveti pūrva-vyañjitam arthaṃ spaṣṭam evāha saṃnyāsas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:287: karma-yogābhāvāc citta-vaiguṇya-praśāmaka-karma-yogasya saṃnyāsiny abhāvāt tatra anadhikārād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:292: śrutir api -yadi na samuddharanti yatayo hṛdi kāma-jaṭā iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:293: bhagavatāpi yas tva saṃyata-ṣaḍ-vargaḥ [BhP 11.18.40] ity ādy uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:295: yoga-yuktaḥ niṣkāma-karmavān munir jñānī san brahma śīghraṃ prāpnoti ||6||
GE07bhg4c05u:296: baladevaḥ : jñāna-yogasya duṣkaratvāt sukara-karma-yogaḥ śreyān ity āha
GE07bhg4c05u:300: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā duḥkhaṃ prāptum bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:301: duṣkaratvāt sapramādatvāc ca duḥkha-hetur eva syād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:302: yoga-yukta-niṣkāma-karmī tu munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sann acireṇa śīghram
GE07bhg4c05u:307: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yogādi-krameṇa brahmādhigame saty api tad-uparitanena
GE07bhg4c05u:308: karmaṇā bandhaḥ syād evety āśaṅkyāha yoga-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:310: ataeva viśuddha ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:313: tataś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasya sa loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vā karma kurvann api na lipyate
GE07bhg4c05u:314: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu karmaṇo bandha-hetutvād yoga-yukto munir brahmādhigacchatīty anupapannam ity ata āha yoga-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:317: tena yogena yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ prathamaṃ viśuddhātmā viśuddho
GE07bhg4c05u:318: rajas-tamo-bhyām akaluṣita ātmāntaḥkaraṇa-rūpaṃ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:323: yasyaite nityatā daṇḍāḥ sa tridaṇḍīti kathyata || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:325: etādṛśasya tattva-jñānam avaśyaṃ bhavatīty āha sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā sarva-bhūta ātma-bhūtaś cātmā svarūpaṃ yasya
GE07bhg4c05u:327: jaḍājaḍātmakaṃ sarva ātma-mātraṃ paśyann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:328: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasyeti vyākhyāne tu sarva-bhūtātmety
GE07bhg4c05u:332: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī kurvann api karmāṇi para-dṛṣṭyā na lipyate taiḥ karmabhiḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā tad-abhāvād ity arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c05u:333: viśvanāthaḥ : kṛtenāpi karmaṇā jñāninas tasya na lepa ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:334: yoga-yukto jñānī trividhaḥ - viśuddhātmā vijita-buddhir ekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:340: etādṛśe gṛhasthe tu sarve 'pi jīvā anurajyantīty āha sarveṣām api bhūtānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadībhūta ātmā deho yasya saḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c05u:341: baladevaḥ : īdṛśī mumukṣuḥ sarveṣāṃ preyān ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:346: ataeva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ jīvānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadatām gata ātmā deho yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:347: na cātra pārtha-sārathinā sarvātmaikyam abhimatam - na tv evāham ity ādinā sarvātmanāṃ mitho bhedasya tenābhidhānāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:350: evambhūtaḥ kurvann api viviktātmānusandhānād anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate acireṇātmānam adhigacchati |
GE07bhg4c05u:353: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattva-vit |
GE07bhg4c05u:354: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan ||8||
GE07bhg4c05u:355: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api |
GE07bhg4c05u:357: śrīdharaḥ : karma kurvann api na lipyata ity etad viruddham ity āśaṅkya kartṛtvābhimānābhāvān na viruddham ity āha naiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:359: yuktaḥ krameṇa tattvavid bhūtvā darśana-śravaṇādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan kiṃcid apy
GE07bhg4c05u:371: etāni karmāṇi kurvann api abhimānābhāvād brahma-vin na lipyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:374: madhusūdanaḥ : etad eva vivṛṇoti naiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:376: antaḥ-karaṇa-catuṣṭayena ca tat-tac-ceṣṭāsu kriyamāṇāsu indriyāṇīndriyādīny evendriyārtheṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu vartante pravartante na tv aham iti dhārayann avadhārayann naiva kiṃcit karomīti manyeta manyate tattvavit paramārtha-darśī yuktaḥ samāhita-cittaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:377: athavādau yuktaḥ karma-yogena paścād antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tattvavid bhūtvā naiva kiṃcit karomīti manyata iti sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:379: cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ pañca-jñānendriyāṇāṃ vyāpārāḥ paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann ity uktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:384: gacchan pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann ity uktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:389: artha-krama-vaśāt pāṭha-kramaṃ bhaṅktvā vyākhyātāv imau ślokau |
GE07bhg4c05u:392: ataḥ kurvann api na lipyata iti yuktam evoktam iti bhāvaḥ ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:393: viśvanāthaḥ : yena karmaṇālepas taṃ prakāraṃ śikṣayati naiveti |
GE07bhg4c05u:395: karma-yogī darśanādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan nirabhimānaḥ kiṃcid apy ahaṃ naiva karomīti
GE07bhg4c05u:401: tattva-vit viviktam ātma-tattvam anubhavan indriyārtheṣu rūpādiṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:402: indriyāṇi cakṣur-ādīni mad-vāsanānuguṇa-paramātma-preritāni vartanta iti dhārayan niścinvann ahaṃ kiṃcid api na karomīti manyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:403: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann iti cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:409: śvasann iti prāṇādīnām unmiṣan nimiṣann iti nāgādīnāṃ prāṇa-bhedānām |
GE07bhg4c05u:410: svapann ity antaḥkaraṇānām ity arthaḥ kramād vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:413: tadīdṛśa-karma-kartṛtvam, na tu svarūpaika-nimittam iti manyata ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:414: | na svarūpa-prayuktam ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti śakyam
GE07bhg4c05u:416: tat tac ca jñānam eva tac cātmano nityam |
GE07bhg4c05u:417: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilāpo vidyate iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:418: tat-siddhiś ca hariṇā dharma-bhūtena jñānena ca ity āhuḥ ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:420: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:421: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā ||10||
GE07bhg4c05u:422: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yasya karomīti abhimāno 'sti tasya karma-lepo durvāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:423: tathāviśuddha-cittatvāt saṃnyāso 'pi nāsti iti mahat saṅkaṭam āpannam ity
GE07bhg4c05u:427: yaḥ karmāṇi karoti asau pāpena bandhu-hetutayā pāpiṣṭhena
GE07bhg4c05u:428: puṇya-pāpātmakena karmaṇā na lipyate yathā padma-patram ambhasi sthitam api tenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat ||10||
GE07bhg4c05u:429: madhusūdanaḥ : tarhy avidvān kartṛtvābhimānāl lipyetaiva tathā ca karthaṃ tasya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā syād iti tatrāha brahmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:430: brahmaṇi parameśvara ādhāya samarpya saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ tyaktveśvarārthaṃ bhṛtya iva svāmy-arthaṃ sva-phala-nirapekṣatayā karomīty abhiprāyeṇa karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c05u:431: laukikāni vaidikāni ca karoti yo lipyate na sa pāpena pāpa-puṇyātmakena
GE07bhg4c05u:433: yathā padma-patram upari prakṣiptenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat |
GE07bhg4c05u:435: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca brahmaṇi parameśvare mayi samarpya saṅgaṃ tyaktvā sābhimāno 'pi karmāsaktiṃ vihāya yaḥ karmāṇi karoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:441: tasmād etad brahma-nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jñāyata iti śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:442: mama yonir mahad brahma iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:443: dehendriyādīni pradhāna-pariṇāma-viśeṣāṇi bhavanti tad-rūpatayā pariṇate pradhāne darśanādīni karmāṇy ādhāya tasyaivaitāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:448: yas tāni karoti sa tādṛg dehādimattayā sann api dehādy-ātmābhimānena pāpena na lipyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:450: na ca mayi saṃnyasya karmāṇi iti pūrva-svārasyād brahmaṇi paramātmanīti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:451: prādhānika-dehādi-saṃsṛṣṭasyaiva jīvasya darśanādi-karma-kartṛtvaṃ, na tu tad-viviktasyety arthasya prakṛtatvāt ||10||
GE07bhg4c05u:453: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api |
GE07bhg4c05u:455: śrīdharaḥ : kevalaṃ sattva-śuddhi-mātra-phalam eva tasya karmaṇaḥ syāt yasmāt kāyeneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:457: yoginaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api |
GE07bhg4c05u:459: sarva-vyāpāreṣu mamatā-varjanāya yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ karma kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:465: kāyena manasā buddhyendriyair api yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ phala-saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvanti kāyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kevalair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:466: īśvarāyaiva karomi na mama phalāyeti mamatā-śūnyair ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:470: havir-ādy-arpaṇa-kāle yadyapi manaḥ kvāpy anyatra tad apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:472: baladevaḥ : sad-ācāraṃ pramāṇayann etad vivṛṇoti kāyeneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:473: kāyādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ karma kāyādy-ahaṃbhāva-śūnyā yoginaḥ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:478: yuktaḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm |
GE07bhg4c05u:480: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kathaṃ tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścid badhyate iti
GE07bhg4c05u:482: yuktaḥ parameśvaraika-niṣṭhaḥ san karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmaṇi kurvann ātyantikīṃ śāntiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:483: ayuktas tu bahirmukhaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā phala āsakto nitarāṃ bandhaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:485: madhusūdanaḥ : kartṛtvābhimāna-sāmye 'pi tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścit tu badhyata iti vaiṣamye ko hetur iti tatrāha yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:486: yukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety evam abhiprāyavān karma-phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:487: tyaktvā karmāṇi kurvan śāntim mokṣākhyām āpnoti naiṣṭhikīṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:489: yas tu punar ayukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety
GE07bhg4c05u:490: abhiprāya-śūnyaḥ sa kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā mama phalāyaivedaṃ karma karomīti phale sakto nibadhyate karmabhir nitarāṃ saṃsāra-bandhaṃ prāpnoti
GE07bhg4c05u:491: | yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api yuktaḥ san karmāṇi kurv iti vākya-śeṣaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:492: viśvanāthaḥ : karma-karaṇe anāsakty-āsaktī eva mokṣa-bandha-hetū ity āha yukto yogī niṣkāma-karmītity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:493: naiṣṭhikīm niṣṭhā-prāptāṃ śāntiṃ mokṣam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:497: baladevaḥ : yukta ātmārpita-manāḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā kurvann naiṣṭhikīm
GE07bhg4c05u:500: karma-phale saktaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ karmaṇi pravṛttyā nibadhyate saṃsarati ||12||
GE07bhg4c05u:503: nava-dvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan ||13||
GE07bhg4c05u:504: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ tāvac citta-śuddhi-śūnyasya saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo
GE07bhg4c05u:506: idānīṃ śuddha-cittasya saṃnyāsaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:508: sarvāṇi karmāṇi vikṣepakāni manasā viveka-yuktena saṃnyasya sukhaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:510: kvāsta iti ? ata āha nava-dvāra iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:511: netre nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ ceti sapta śiro-gatāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:514: nava-dvārāṇi yasmiṃs tasmin pure puravad ahaṅkāra-śūnye dehe dehy avatiṣṭhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:515: ahaṅkārābhāvād eva svyaṃ tena dehena naiva kurvan
GE07bhg4c05u:516: mama-kārābhāvāc ca na kārayan ity aviśuddha-cittād vyavṛttir uktā |
GE07bhg4c05u:517: aśuddha-citto hi saṃnyasya punaḥ karoti kārayati ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:520: madhusūdanaḥ : aśuddha-cittasya kevalāt saṃnyāsāt karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti pūrvoktaṃ prapañcyādhunā śuddha-cittasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva śreyān ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:521: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ceti sarvāṇi karmāṇi manasā karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity atroktenākartrātma-svarūpa-samyag-darśanena saṃnyasya parityajya prārabdha-karma-vaśād āste tiṣṭhaty eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:522: kiṃ duḥkhena nety āha sukham anāyāsena |
GE07bhg4c05u:525: svacchandāni kuto na vyāpriyante tatrāha vaśī
GE07bhg4c05u:528: dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike vāg eketi śirasi sapta |
GE07bhg4c05u:529: dve pāyūpasthākhye adha iti nava-dvāra-viśiṣṭe dehe |
GE07bhg4c05u:531: para-gehe tat-pūjā-paribhavādibhir aprahṛṣyann aviṣīdann ahaṅkāra-mamakāra-śūnyas tiṣṭhati
GE07bhg4c05u:532: ajño hi dehatādātmyābhimānād deha eva na tu dehī |
GE07bhg4c05u:533: sa ca dehādhikaraṇam evātmano 'dhikaraṇaṃ manyamāno gṛhe bhūmāvasāne vāham āsa ity abhimanyate na tu dehe 'ham āsa iti bheda-darśanābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:537: avidyayātmany akriye samāropitānāṃ vidyayā bādha eva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa
GE07bhg4c05u:539: etasmād evājña-vailakṣaṇyādy-uktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nava-dvāre pure āsta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:540: nanu dehādi-vyāpārāṇām ātmany āropitānāṃ nau-vyāpārāṇāṃ tīrastha-vṛkṣa iva vidyayā bādhe 'pi sva-vyāpāreṇātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ dehādi-vyāpāreṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:541: kārayitṛtvaṃ ca syād iti nety āha naiva kurvan na kārayan |
GE07bhg4c05u:543: viśvanāthaḥ : ato 'nāsaktaḥ karmāṇi kurvann api jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī
GE07bhg4c05u:544: iti pūrvoktavad vastutaḥ saṃnyāsī evocyate tatrāha sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa bahiḥ kurvann api vaśī jitendriyaḥ sukham āste
GE07bhg4c05u:545: | kutra ? nava-dvāre pure ahaṃ-bhāva-śūnye dehe dehy utpanna-jñāno jīvo naiva kurvann iti karma-sukhasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvaṃ naivāstīti jānan, na kārayann iti nāpi teṣu prayojana-kartṛtvam ity api jānann ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c05u:548: saṃnyasyārpayitvā dehādinā bahis tāni kurvann api vaśī jitendriyaḥ sukhaṃ āste |
GE07bhg4c05u:549: nava-dvāre pure puravad ahaṃ-bhāva-varjite dehe dve netre dve nāsike dve śrotre mukhaṃ ceti śirasi sapta dvārāṇi adhastāt tu pāyūpasthākhye dve iti nava-dvārāṇi dehī labdha-jñānojīvaḥ naiveti
GE07bhg4c05u:550: dehādi-viviktasyātmanaḥ karmasu kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca nāstīti vijānann
GE07bhg4c05u:553: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:555: śrīdharaḥ : nanu eṣa hy evainaṃ sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate |
GE07bhg4c05u:556: eṣa asādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity-ādi-śruteḥ parameśvareṇaiva śubhāśubha-phaleṣu karmasu kartṛtvena prayujyamāno 'svatantraḥ puruṣaḥ kathaṃ tāni karmāṇi tyajet ? īśvareṇaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:557: jñāna-mārge prayujyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhani ca tyakṣyatīti cet ? evaṃ sati vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyābhyām īśvarasyāpi prayojaka-kartṛtvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:558: puṇya-pāpa-sambandhaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha na kartṛtvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:559: prabhur īśvaro jīva-lokasya kartṛtvādikaṃ na sṛjati, kintu jīvasya svabhāvo 'vidyaiva kartṛtvādi-rūpeṇa pravartate |
GE07bhg4c05u:562: na tu svayam eva kartṛtvādikam utpādayatīty arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c05u:563: madhusūdanaḥ : devadattasya svagataiva gatir yathā sthitau satyāṃ na bhavati evam ātmano 'pi kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvam na svagatam eva sat-saṃnyāse sati na bhavati, athavā nabhasi tala-malinatādivad
GE07bhg4c05u:564: vastu-vṛttyā tatra nāsty eveti sandehāpohāyāha na kartṛtvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:565: lokasya dehādeḥ kartṛtvaṃ prabhur ātmā svāmī na sṛjati tvaṃ kurv iti niyogena tasya kārayitā na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:566: nāpi lokasya karmāṇīpsitatamāni ghaṭādīni svayaṃ sṛjati kartāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:567: nāpi lokasya karma kṛtavatas tat-phala-sambandhaṃ sṛjati bhojayitāpi bhoktāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:568: na samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:569: atrāpi śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.31] ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:570: yadi kiṃcid api svato na kārayati na karoti cātmā kas tarhi kārayan kurvaṃś ca pravartata iti tatrāha svabhāvas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:572: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu ca yadi jīvasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvādikaṃ naivāsti, tarhi
GE07bhg4c05u:574: manye parameśareṇaiva balāt tasya kartṛtvādikaṃ sṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c05u:576: vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye prasakte, tatra na hi nahīty āha na kartṛtvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:577: nāpi tat-kartṛtvena karmāṇy api, na ca karma-phalair bhogaiḥ saṃyogam api,
GE07bhg4c05u:579: taṃ jīvaṃ kartṛtvādy-abhimānam ārohayitum iti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c05u:580: baladevaḥ : etad dvayaṃ śuddhasya nāstīti viśadayati neti |
GE07bhg4c05u:581: prabhur dehendriyādīnāṃ svāmī jīvo lokasya janasya kartṛtvaṃ na sṛjatīti tvaṃ kurv iti kārayitā na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:582: nāpi tasyepsitatamāni karmāṇi mālyāmbarādīni sṛjatīti svayaṃ kartāpi na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:583: na ca karma-phalena sukhena duḥkhena ca saṃyogaṃ sambandhaṃ sṛjatīti bhojayitā bhoktā ca na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:584: yady evaṃ, tarhi kaḥ kārayan kurvaṃś ca pratīyate ? tatrāha svabhāvas tv
GE07bhg4c05u:587: svabhāva-śabdenokta-prādhānika-dehādimān jīvaḥ kārayitā kartā ceti na viviktasya tattvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:588: śuddhe 'pi kiṃcit kartṛtvam asty eva pūrvatra sukhāsane tattvasyokteḥ bhānādāv ivaitad bodhyaṃ, dhātv-arthaḥ khalu
GE07bhg4c05u:591: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:593: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:594: prayojako 'pi san prabhuḥ kasyacit pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte na bhajate |
GE07bhg4c05u:597: yadi hi svārtha-kāmanayā kārayet tarhi tathā syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:601: nanu bhaktān anugṛhṇato 'bhaktān nigṛhṇataś ca vaiṣamyopalambhāt katham
GE07bhg4c05u:605: evam ajñānena sarvatra samaḥ parameśvara ity evaṃbhūtaṃ jñānam āvṛtam |
GE07bhg4c05u:608: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv īśvaraḥ kārayitā jīvaḥ kartā, tathā ca śrutiḥ - eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam unninīyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:609: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:612: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvabhram eva ca || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:614: bhoktṛtva-bhojayitṛtvābhyāṃ ca pāpa-puṇya-lepa-sambhavāt katham uktaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartata iti tatrāha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:615: paramārthataḥ vibhuḥ parameśvaraḥ kasyacit jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte paramārthato jīvasya kartṛtvābhāvāt parameśvarasya ca kārayitṛtvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:616: kathaṃ tarhi śrutiḥ smṛtir loka-vyavahāraś ca tatrāha ajñānenāvaraṇa-vikṣepā-śaktimatā
GE07bhg4c05u:619: sac-cid-ānanda-rūpam advitīyaṃ paramārtha-satyaṃ, tena svarūpāvaraṇena muhyanti
GE07bhg4c05u:621: moham atasmiṃs tad-avabhāsa-rūpaṃ vikṣepaṃ gacchanti jantavo janana-śīlāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:627: viśvanāthaḥ : yasmād asādhu-sādhu-karmaṇām īśvaro na kārayitā, tasmād eva na tasya pāpa-puṇya-bhāgitvam ity āha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:629: kintu tadīyā khalu yā śaktir avidyā saiva jīva-jñānam āvṛṇoti ity āha
GE07bhg4c05u:633: baladevaḥ : nanu yadi viśuddhasya jīvasya tādṛśa-karma-kartṛtvādi nāstīti
GE07bhg4c05u:634: brūṣe, tarhi kautukākrāntaḥ paramātmā pradhānaṃ tad-gale nipātya
GE07bhg4c05u:637: anyathā eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate |
GE07bhg4c05u:638: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate iti śrutiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:640: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśv abhram eva ca ||
GE07bhg4c05u:643: prayojake tasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ pāpādi-bhāgitvaṃ ca syād iti cet tatrāha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:647: tad-vāsanānusāreṇa karmāṇi kārayan kasyacij jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca nādatte na gṛhṇāti |
GE07bhg4c05u:653: audāsīnya-mātre 'yaṃ gandhādi-dṛṣṭānto na tv icchāyā abhāve tasyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:656: tarhi jīvās taṃ viṣamaṃ kuto vadanti, tatrāha ajñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:657: anādi-tad-vaimukhyenājñānena jīvānāṃ nityam api jñānam āvṛtaṃ tirohitam |
GE07bhg4c05u:659: samam api taṃ vimūḍhā viṣamaṃ vadanti na vijñā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:661: vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati [Vs 2.1.35], na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvāt [Vs 2.1.36] iti ||15||
GE07bhg4c05u:663: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:665: śrīdharaḥ : jñāninas tu na muhyantīty āha jñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:666: bhagavato jñānena yeṣāṃ tad-vaiṣamyopalambhakam ajñānaṃ nāśitam taj jñānaṃ teṣām ajñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:667: nāśayitvā tat paraṃ paripūrṇam īśvara-svarūpaṃ prakāśayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:668: yathādityas tamo nirasya samastaṃ vastu-jātaṃ prakāśayati tadvat ||16||
GE07bhg4c05u:672: ajñānam ātmāśraya-viṣayam avidyā-māyādi-śabda-vācyam ātmano jñānena gurūpadiṣṭa-vedānta-mahā-vākya-janyena
GE07bhg4c05u:676: nāśitaṃ bādhitaṃ kāla-traye 'py asad evāsattayā jñātam
GE07bhg4c05u:677: adhiṣṭhāna-caitanya-mātratāṃ prāpitaṃ śuktāv iva rajataṃ śukti-jñānena
GE07bhg4c05u:680: ādityavad yathādityaḥ svodaya-mātreṇaiva tamo niravaśeṣaṃ nivartayati na tu kaṃcit sahāyam apekṣate tathā brahma-jñānam api śuddha-sattva-pariṇāmatvād
GE07bhg4c05u:682: sa-kāryam ajñānaṃ nivartayat param satya-jñānaānantānanda-rūpam ekam evādvitīyaṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ prakāśayati praticchāyā-grahaṇa-mātreṇaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:686: nahy abhāvaḥ kiṃcid āvṛṇoti na vā jñānābhāvo jñānena nāśyate svabhāvato
GE07bhg4c05u:688: tasmād aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīty ādi-sākṣi-pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ bhāva-rūpam evājñānam iti bhagavato matam |
GE07bhg4c05u:691: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad yo yo
GE07bhg4c05u:692: devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat tatha rṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇāṃ tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati ity ādir yad viṣayaṃ yad-āśrayam ajñānaṃ tad-viṣaya-tad-āśraya-pramāṇa-jñānāt
GE07bhg4c05u:695: āvaraṇaṃ dvividham - ekaṃ sato 'py asattvāpādakam anyat tu bhāto 'py
GE07bhg4c05u:701: tathā satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmāsti iti vākyāt
GE07bhg4c05u:702: parokṣa-niścaye 'pi brahma nāstīti bhramo nivartata eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:703: asty eva brahma kintu mama na bhātīty ekaṃ bhrama-janakaṃ dvitīyam abhānāvaraṇaṃ sākṣātkārād eva nivartate |
GE07bhg4c05u:704: sa ca sākṣātkāro vedānta-vākyenaiva janyate nirvikalpaka ity ādy advaita-siddhāv anusandheyam
GE07bhg4c05u:705: viśvanāthaḥ : yathāvidyā tasya jñānam āvṛṇoti, tathaivāparā tasya vidyā-śaktir avidyāṃ vināśya jñānaṃ prakāśayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:709: teṣāṃ jīvānāṃ jñānam eva kartṛ ādityavad
GE07bhg4c05u:711: tathaiva vidyayaivāvidyāṃ vināśya taj-jīva-niṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ param aprākṛtaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:713: tena parameśvaro na kam api badhnāti, nāpi kam api mocayati
GE07bhg4c05u:714: | kintv ajñāna-jñāne prakṛter eva dharmaḥ krameṇa badhnāti mocayati ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:718: kintu parameśvarasyāntaryāmitva eva prakṛtes te te dharmā udbudhyanta ity etad-aṃśenaiva tasya prayojakatvam iti na tasya vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye ||16||
GE07bhg4c05u:719: baladevaḥ : vijñā na muhyantīty etad āha jñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:722: jñānāgniḥ sarva-karmāṇi [Gītā 4.37], na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ [Gītā 4.38] iti cokta-mahimnā sad-guru-prasāda-labdhena
GE07bhg4c05u:724: ajñānaṃ nāśitaṃ pradhvaṃsitaṃ teṣāṃ taj-jñānaṃ kartṛ paraṃ prakāśayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:725: dehādeḥ paraṃ jīvaṃ vaiṣamyādi-doṣāt param īśvaraṃ ca bodhayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:726: ādityavat yathā ravir udita eva tamo nirasyan yathāvad vastu pradarśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:727: tathā sad-gurūpadeśa-labdham ātma-jñānaṃ yathāvad ātma-vastv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:728: atra vinaṣṭājñānānāṃ jīvānāṃ bahutvaṃ nigadatā pārtha-sārathinā mokṣe teṣāṃ tad-darśitaṃ aupādhikatvaṃ tasya praty uktaṃ neme janādhipāḥ ity upakramoktaṃ ca tat sopapattikam abhūt BhG 5.17
GE07bhg4c05u:731: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūteśvaropāsakānāṃ phalam āha tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:735: tad eva param ayamam āśrayo yeṣām |
GE07bhg4c05u:736: tataś ca tat-prasāda-labdhenātma-jñānena nirdhūtaṃ nirastaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yeṣām |
GE07bhg4c05u:739: madhusūdanaḥ : jñānena paramātma-tattva-prakāśe sati tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:741: bāhya-sarva-viṣaya-parityāgena sādhana-paripākāt paryavasitā buddhir antaḥkaraṇa-vṛttiḥ sākṣātkāra-lakṣaṇā yeṣāṃ te tad-buddhayaḥ sarvadā
GE07bhg4c05u:743: tat kiṃ boddhāro jīvā boddhavyaṃ brahma-tattvam iti boddhṛ-boddhavya-bhāvo hi māyā-vijṛmbhito
GE07bhg4c05u:748: ajñā api hi vastu-gatyā tad-ātmāna iti kathaṃ tad-vyāvṛttir iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c05u:750: ajñā hi anātma-bhūte dehādāv ātmābhimānina iti na tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyante |
GE07bhg4c05u:751: vijñās tu nivṛtta-dehādy-abhimānā iti virodhi-nivṛttyā tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyanta iti yuktaṃ viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c05u:752: nanu karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepe sati kathaṃ dehādy-abhimāna-nivṛttir iti tatrāha tan-niṣṭhā iti
GE07bhg4c05u:754: sarva-karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepa-nivṛttyā niṣṭhā sthitir yeṣāṃ te tan-niṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:756: phala-rāge sati kathaṃ tat-sādhana-bhūta-karma-tyāga iti tatrāha tat-parāyaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:757: tad eva param ayanaṃ prāptavyaṃ yeṣāṃ te tat-parāyaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:759: atra tad-buddhaya ity anena sākṣātkāra uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:765: ukta-viśeṣaṇā yatayo gacchanty apunar-āvṛttiṃ punar-deha-sambandhābhāva-rūpāṃ muktiṃ prāpnuvanti
GE07bhg4c05u:766: sakṛn muktānām api punar deha-sambandhaḥ kuto na syād iti tatrāha jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣāḥ jñānena nirdhūtaṃ samūlam unmūlitaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:767: punar-deha-sambandha-kāraṇaṃ kalmaṣaṃ puṇya-pāpātmakaṃ karma yeṣāṃ te
GE07bhg4c05u:770: punar deha-grahaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhaved iti bhāvaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c05u:771: viśvanāthaḥ : kintu vidyā jīvātma-jñānam eva prakāśayati, na tu paramātma-jñānaṃ bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:773: paramātma-jñānārthaṃ jñānibhir api punar viśeṣato bhaktiḥ kāryā ity ata āha tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:775: tasmin parameśvara eva buddhir yeṣām te tam-manana-parā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:776: tad-ātmānas tan-manaskās tam eva dhyāyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:777: tan-niṣṭhāḥ jñānaṃ mayi saṃnyaset iti bhagavad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:782: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:783: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram || [Gītā 18.55] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:784: jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣā jñānena vidyāyaiva pūrvam eva dhvasta-samastāvidyāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:785: baladevaḥ : paramātmany avaiṣamyādi-dhyāyatāṃ phalam āha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:787: tad-avaiṣamyādike guṇa-gaṇe buddhir niścayātmikā yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c05u:792: nirdhūta-kalmaṣā vinaṣṭa-tad-vaimukhyāḥ santa apunar-āvṛttiṃ muktiṃ gacchantīti ||17||
GE07bhg4c05u:795: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:796: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśās te jñānino ye 'punar-āvṛttiṃ gacchantīty apekṣāyām āha
GE07bhg4c05u:798: viṣameṣv api samaṃ brahmaiva draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:801: śuno yaḥ pacati tasmin śvapāke ca iti karmaṇā vaiṣamyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:802: gavi hastini śuni ceti jātito vaiṣamyaṃ darśitam ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:803: madhusūdanaḥ : deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ videha-kaivalya-rūpaṃ jñāna-phalam uktvā
GE07bhg4c05u:804: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt saty api dehe jīvan-mukti-rūpaṃ tat-phalam āha vidyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:811: tathā hastini śuni śvapāke cātyanta tāmase sarvādhame 'pi |
GE07bhg4c05u:812: sattvādi-guṇais taj-jaiś ca saṃskārair aspṛṣṭam eva samaṃ brahma draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te sama-darśinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:815: gaṅgā-toye taḍāge surāyāṃ mūtre vā pratibimbitasyādityasya na
GE07bhg4c05u:817: pratibimbitasya nopādhi-gata-guṇa-doṣa-sambandha iti pratisandadhānāḥ sarvatra sama-dṛṣṭyaiva rāga-dveṣa-rāhityena paramānanda-sphūrtyā
GE07bhg4c05u:819: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca guṇātītānāṃ teṣāṃ guṇa-maye vastu-mātra eva
GE07bhg4c05u:820: tāratamya-mayaṃ viśeṣam ajighṛkṣūṇāṃ sama-buddhir eva syād ity āha vidyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:823: śuni ca śvapāke ceti tāmas-jātitvād adhame 'pi tat-tad-viśeṣāgrahaṇāt sama-darśinaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:828: tādṛśe brāhmaṇe śvapāke ceti karmaṇaitau viṣamau gavi hastini śuni ceti jātyaite viṣamāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:829: evaṃ viṣamatayā sṛṣṭeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu ye paramātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyanti, ta eva paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:830: tat-karmānusāriṇī tena teṣāṃ tathā tathā sṛṣṭiḥ, na tu rāga-dveṣānusāriṇīti parjanyavat sarvatra samaḥ paramātmeti ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:832: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:833: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:834: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣamesu sama-darśanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ kurvanto 'pi kathaṃ te paṇḍitāḥ ? yathāha gautamaḥ samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjātaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:835: asyārthaḥ samāya pūjayā viṣame prakāre kṛte sati viṣamāya ca same prakāre kṛte sati sa pūjaka iha lokāt para-lokāc ca hīyata iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:840: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye samatve sthitaṃ |
GE07bhg4c05u:841: tatra hetuḥ -- hi yasmād brahma samaṃ nirdoṣaṃ ca tasmāt te sama-darśino brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:848: tathā ca tasyānnam abhojyam ity upakramya gautamaḥ smarati samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjāta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:856: tathālpa-vedānāṃ hīnācārāṇāṃ yādṛśo hīna-sādhanaḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ kriyate tādṛśāyaivāsamāya pūrvokta-veda-pāraga-sad-ācāra-brāhmaṇāpekṣayā hīnāya
GE07bhg4c05u:857: tādṛśa-hīna-pūjādhike mukhya-pūjā-same pūjā-prakāre kṛte, uttamasya hīnatayā hīnasyottamatayā pūjāto hetos tasya pūjayitur annam abhojyaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:859: pūjayitā pratipatti-viśesam akurvan dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata iti ca doṣāntaram |
GE07bhg4c05u:860: yadyapi yatīnāṃ niṣparigrahāṇāṃ pākābhāvād dhanābhāvāc cābhojyānnatvaṃ dhana-hīnatvaṃ ca svata eva vidyate tathāpi dharma-hānir doso bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:862: tapo-dhanānāṃ ca tapa eva dhanam iti tad-dhānir
GE07bhg4c05u:863: api dūṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eveti kathaṃ sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā jīvan-muktā iti prāpte pariharati ihaiveti
GE07bhg4c05u:864: taiḥ sama-darśibhiḥ paṇḍitair ihaiva jīvana-daśāyām eva jito 'tikrāntaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:866: deha-pātād ūrdhvam atikramitavya iti kim u vaktavyam ? kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ sāmye sarva-bhūteṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:867: viṣameṣv api vartamānasya brahmaṇaḥ sama-bhāve sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:868: hi yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnyaṃ kūṭastha-nityam ekaṃ ca brahma
GE07bhg4c05u:871: duṣṭatvam hi dvedhā bhavati aduṣṭasyāpi duṣṭa-sambandhāt
GE07bhg4c05u:875: tatra doṣavatsu śvapākādiṣu sthitaṃ doṣair duṣyati brahmeti mūḍhair vibhāvyamānam api sarva-doṣāsaṃsṛṣṭam eva brahma vyomavad
GE07bhg4c05u:878: sūryo yathā sarva-lokasya cakṣur na lipyate cākṣuṣair bāhya-doṣaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:880: na lipyate loka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:881: nāpi kāmādi-dharmavattayā svata eva kaluṣitaṃ kāmāder
GE07bhg4c05u:884: nirdoṣa-brahma-rūpā yatayo jīvan-muktā abhojyānnādi-doṣa-duṣṭāś ceti vyāhṛtam |
GE07bhg4c05u:888: dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata ity upasaṃhārāc ceti draṣṭavyam ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:890: ihaiva iha loka eva sṛjyata iti sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:892: iha sādhana-daśāyām eva taiḥ sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:893: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye 'vaiṣamyākhye brahma-dharme sthitaṃ niviṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c05u:895: hi yato brahmaṇy avaiṣamyādikaṃ niścikyus tasmāt prapañce tiṣṭhanto 'pi te brahmaṇy eva
GE07bhg4c05u:898: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:900: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-prāptasya lakṣaṇam āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:902: bhūtvā brahmaṇy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ sa priyaṃ prāpya na prahṛṣyet
GE07bhg4c05u:904: apriyam prāpya ca nodvijet na viṣīdatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:905: yataḥ sthira-buddhir sthirā niścalā buddhir yasya |
GE07bhg4c05u:908: madhusūdanaḥ : yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ brahma tasmāt tad-rūpam ātmānaṃ sākṣātkurvann āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:911: jīvan-muktānāṃ svābhāvikaṃ caritam eva mumukṣubhiḥ prayatna-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyam iti vadituṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:914: vyatirikta-priyāpriya-prāpty-ayogyāc ca tan-nimittau harṣa-viṣādāv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:915: advitīyātma-darśanam eva vivṛṇoti - sthira-buddhiḥ sthirā niścalā saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-vedānta-vākya-vicāra-paripākeṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:916: nirvicikitsā niścitā brahmaṇi buddhir yasya sa tathā
GE07bhg4c05u:919: sarvāsaṃbhāvanā-śūnyatve 'pi viparīta-bhāva-pratibandhāt sākṣātkāro nodetīti nididhyāsanam āha - asaṃmūḍhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:925: tataś ca samādhi-paripākeṇa nirdoṣe same brahmaṇy eva sthito nānyatreti brahmaṇi sthito jīvan-muktaḥ sthita-prajña
GE07bhg4c05u:927: etādṛśasya dvaita-darśanābhāvāt praharṣodvegau na bhavata ity ucitam eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:930: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ laukika-priyāpriyādiṣv api teṣāṃ sāmyam āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:933: sādhana-daśāyām evam abhyased iti vivakṣayā vā liṅ |
GE07bhg4c05u:936: baladevaḥ : brahmaṇi sthitasya lakṣaṇam āha neti |
GE07bhg4c05u:937: vartamāne dehe sthitaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭaṃ priyam apriyaṃ ca prāpya na prahṛṣyen na codvijet |
GE07bhg4c05u:940: asaṃmūḍho 'nityena dehena nityam ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaṃ na labdhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:944: bāhya-sparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:946: śrīdharaḥ : moha-nivṛttyā buddhi-sthairye hetum āha bāhya-sparśeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:952: sa copaśamaṃ sukhaṃ labdhvā brahmaṇi yogena samādhinā yuktas tadaikyaṃ prāpta ātmā yasya so 'kṣayaṃ sukham aśnute prāpnoti ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:954: aneka-janmānubhūtatvenātipracalatvāt tad-āsakta-cittasya katham alaukike brahmaṇi dṛṣṭa-sarva-sukha-rahite sthitiḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:960: dṛṣṭānandābhilāṣaṃ sa na mandīkartum apy alam || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:965: teṣv asaktātmānāsakta-cittas tṛṣṇā-śūnyatayā viraktaḥ sann ātmani antaḥ-karaṇa eva bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣaṃ yad upaśamātmakaṃ sukhaṃ tad vindati labhate nirmala-sattva-vṛttyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:967: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:969: athavā pratyag-ātmani tvaṃ-padārthe yat sukhaṃ svarūpa-bhūtaṃ suṣuptāv anubhūyamānaṃ bāhya-viṣayāsakti-pratibandhād alambhamānaṃ tad eva
GE07bhg4c05u:971: na kevalaṃ tvaṃ-padārtha-sukham eva labhate kintu
GE07bhg4c05u:972: tat-padārthaikyānubhavena pūrṇa-sukham apīty āha sa tṛṣṇā-śūnyo brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktas tasmin vyāpṛta ātmāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:975: vākyārthānubhava-rūpeṇa samādhinā yukta aikyaṃ prāpta ātmā tvaṃ-padārtha-svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:977: sva-svarūpa-bhūtam aśnute vyāpnoti sukhānubhava-rūpa eva sarvadā bhavatīty
GE07bhg4c05u:982: bāhya-viṣaya-prīteḥ kṣaṇikāyā mahā-narakānubandhinyāḥ sakāśād indriyāṇi nivartayet tāvataiva ca brahmaṇi sthitir bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:983: viśvanāthaḥ : sa ca bāhya-sparśeṣu viṣaya-sukheṣv asaktātmā anāsakta-manāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:984: | tatra hetur ātmani jīvātmani paramātmānaṃ vindati sati prāpte yat sukhaṃ tad akṣayaṃ sukham
GE07bhg4c05u:985: sa evāśnute prāpnoti, na hi nirantaram amṛtāsvādine mṛttikā rocata iti bhāvaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:986: baladevaḥ : paurvauttaryeṇa sva-parātmānāv anubhavatīty āha bāhyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:987: bāhya-sparśeṣu śabdādi-viṣayānubhaveṣu asaktātmā san yadātmani sva-svarūpe
GE07bhg4c05u:988: 'nubhūyamāne sukham tadādau vindati, tad uttaraṃ brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tad-yuktātmā san yad akṣayaṃ mahad-anubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ sukham tad aśnute labhate ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:990: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te |
GE07bhg4c05u:991: ādy-anta-vantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c05u:992: śrīdharaḥ : nanu priya-viṣaya-bhogānām api nivṛtteḥ kathaṃ mokṣaḥ puruṣārthaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:994: saṃsparśā viṣayās tebhyo jātā ye bhogāḥ sukhāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:1000: akṣaya-sukhānubhavas tasmiṃś ca sati tat-prasādād eva
GE07bhg4c05u:1001: bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttir itītaretarāśraya-vaśān naikam api sidhyed ity āśaṅkya viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsenaiva tat-prīti-nivṛttir bhavatīti parihāram āha ye hīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1003: bhogāḥ kṣudra-sukha-lavānubhavā iha vā paratra vā rāga-dveṣādi-vyāptatvena
GE07bhg4c05u:1008: yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ saṃbandhān manasaḥ priyān |
GE07bhg4c05u:1010: etādṛśā aḸ na sthirāḥ kintu ādy-anta-vantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1012: 'ntaś ca tad-viyoga evaṃ tau vidyete yeṣāṃ te pūrvāparayor asattvān madhye svapnavad āvirbhūtāḥ kṣaṇikā mithyā-bhūtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1014: ādāv ante ca yat tv asti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1015: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt teṣu budho vivekī na ramate pratikūla-vedanīyatvāc ca prītim anubhavati
GE07bhg4c05u:1017: pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkhair guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ [YogS 2.15] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1018: sarvam api viṣaya-sukhaṃ dṛṣṭam ānuśravikaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c05u:1022: akṣi-pātra-kalpo hi vidvān atyalpa-duḥkha-leśenāpy udvijate yathorṇa-tantur atisukumāro
GE07bhg4c05u:1023: akṣi-pātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati netareṣv aṅgeṣu tadvad vivekina eva madhu-viṣa-saṃpṛktānna-bhojanavat sarvam api bhoga-sādhanaṃ kāla-traye 'pi
GE07bhg4c05u:1024: kleśānubiddhatvād duḥkhaṃ na mūḍhasya bahuvidha-duḥkha-sahiṣṇor ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1028: tatra pariṇāmaś ca tāpaś ca saṃskāraś ca ta eva duḥkhāni tair ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1032: na hi tatra na rajyati tena sukhī ceti sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1033: rāga eva ca pūrvam udbhūtaḥ san viṣaya-prāptyā sukha-rūpeṇa pariṇamate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1036: yā hi bhogeṣv indriyāṇām upaśāntiḥ paritṛptatvāt tat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:1038: na cendriyāṇāṃ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kartuṃ śakyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1039: yato bhogābhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇāṃ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1041: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1043: tasmād duḥkhātmaka-rāga-pariṇāmatvād viṣaya-sukham api duḥkham eva
GE07bhg4c05u:1046: nānupahatya bhūtāny upabhogaḥ sambhavatīti bhūtāni ca hinasti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1047: dveṣaś ca sarvāṇi duḥkha-sādhanāni me mā bhūvann iti saṅkalpa-viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1048: na ca tāni sarvāṇi kaścid api parihartuṃ śaknoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1053: evaṃ duḥkha-sādhanāni parihartum aśakto muhyati ceti moha-duḥkhatāpi vyākhyeyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1054: tathā coktaṃ yoga-bhāṣya-kāraiḥ - sarvasya dveṣānubiddhaś cetanācetana-sādhanādhīnas
GE07bhg4c05u:1057: sukha-sādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1058: tataḥ param anugṛṇāty upahanti ceti parānuraha-pīḍābhyāṃ dharmādharmāv upacinoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1059: na karmāśayo lobhān mohāc ca bhavati ity eṣā tāpa-duḥkhatocyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1060: tathā vartamānaḥ sukhānubhavaḥ sva-vināśa-kāle saṃskāram ādhatte |
GE07bhg4c05u:1062: tac ca rāgaṃ, sa ca manaḥ-kāya-vacana-ceṣṭāṃ, sā ca puṇyāpuṇya-karmāśayau,
GE07bhg4c05u:1065: evaṃ kāla-traye 'pi duḥkhānuvedhād viṣaya-sukhaṃ duḥkham evety uktvā
GE07bhg4c05u:1069: api taila-varty-agnaya iva dīpaṃ puruṣa-bhogopayuktatvena try-ātmakam ekaṃ kāryam ārabhante tatraikasya prādhānye dvayor guṇa-bhāvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:1070: pradhāna-mātra-vyapadeśena sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasam iti triguṇam api
GE07bhg4c05u:1074: tathā ca sukhātmakatvavad duḥkhātmakatvaṃ viṣādātmakatvaṃ ca tasya dhruvam iti duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1076: yasmāc calaṃ ca guṇa-vṛttam iti kṣipra-pariṇāmi cittam uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1077: nanv ekaḥ pratyayaḥ kathaṃ paraspara-viruddha-sukha-duḥkha-mohatvāny ekadā pratipadyata iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c05u:1079: sama-vṛttikānām eva hi guṇānāṃ yugapad virodho na viṣama-vṛttikānām |
GE07bhg4c05u:1081: evādharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvaryaiḥ saha virudhyante na tu svarūpa-sadbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1082: pradhānasya pradhānena saha virodho na tu durbaleneti hi nyāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1084: sattva-rajas-tamāṃsy api parasparaṃ prādhānya-mātraṃ yugapan na sahante na tu sad-bhāvam api
GE07bhg4c05u:1101: sati mūle tad-vipāko jātyāyur bhogāḥ [YogS 2.3-13] iti pātañjalāni sūtrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c05u:1105: | tatrānitye nitya-buddhir yathā - dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvā sa-candra-tārakā
GE07bhg4c05u:1107: aśucau parama-bībhatse kāye śuci-buddhir yathā naveva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṃ kanyā madhv-amṛtāvayava-nirmiteva candraṃ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate nīlotpala-patrāyatākṣī hāvagarbhābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ jīva-lokam āśvāsayatīveti kasya kena sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1108: sthānād bījād upaṣṭambhān niṣyandān nidhanād api |
GE07bhg4c05u:1110: paṇḍitā hy aśuciṃ viduḥ || iti ca vaiyāsaki-ślokaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1114: ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekina iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1115: anātmany ātma-khyātir yathā śarīre manuṣyo 'ham ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1116: iyaṃ cāvidyā sarva-kleśa-mūla-bhūtā tama ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1119: sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti viparyaya-viśeṣo rāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1121: duḥkha-sādhane vidyamāne 'pi kim api duḥkham me mā bhūd iti
GE07bhg4c05u:1124: āyur-abhāve 'py etaiḥ śarīrendriyādibhir anityair api viyogo me mā bhūd ity āvidvad-aṅganā-bālaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1129: tamo moho mahā-mohas tāmisro hy andha-saṃjñitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1131: ete ca kleśāś catur avasthā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1144: te ca kleśāḥ prasuptā yathā prakṛti-līnānāṃ, tanavaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1146: ta ubhaye 'pi sūkṣmāḥ pratiprasavena mano-nirodhenaiva nirbīja-samādhinā heyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1147: ye tu sūkṣma-vṛttayas tat-kārya-bhūtāḥ sthūlā vicchinnā udāhārāś ca vicchidya vicchidya tena tenātmanā punaḥ prādurbhavantīti vicchinnāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1149: rāga-kāle krodho vidyamāno 'pi na prādurbhūta iti vicchinna ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1150: evam ekasyāṃ striyāṃ caitro rakta iti nānyāsu viraktaḥ kintv ekasyāṃ rāgo labdha-vṛttir anyāsu ca bhaviṣyad-vṛttir iti sa tadā vicchinna ucyate, ye yadā viṣayeṣu labdha-vṛttayas te tadā sarvātmanā prādurbhūtā udārā ucyante, ta ubhaye 'py atisthūlatvāc chuddha-sattva-bhavena
GE07bhg4c05u:1155: udāratā tu kadācit kasyacid iti viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1156: ete ca bādhanā-lakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham upajanayantaḥ kleśa-śabda-vācyā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1158: sati ca mūla-bhūte kleśe tasya karmāśayasya vipākaḥ phalaṃ janmāyur bhogaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1159: sa ca karmāśaya iha paratra ca sva-vipākārambhakatvena dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-janma-vedanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1162: ataḥ samīcīnam uktaṃ ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te ādyantavanta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1163: duḥkha-yonitvaṃ pariṇāmādibhir guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca ādyantavattvaṃ guṇa-vṛttasya calatvād iti yoga-mate vyākhyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1164: aupaniṣadānāṃ tu anādi bhāva-rūpam ajñānam avidyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1170: nivṛtta-bhramas teṣu na ramate, mṛga-tṛṣṇikā-svarūpa-jñānavān iva tatrodakārthī na pravartate
GE07bhg4c05u:1171: na saṃsāre sukhasya gandha-mātram apy astīti buddhvā tataḥ sarvāṇīndriyāṇi nivartayed ity arthaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c05u:1172: viśvanāthaḥ : vivekavān eva vastuto viṣaya-sukhenaiva sajjatīty āha ye
GE07bhg4c05u:1174: baladevaḥ : adṛṣṭākṛṣṭeṣu viṣaya-bhogeṣv anityatva-viniścayān na sajjatīty āha ye hīti
GE07bhg4c05u:1179: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c05u:1180: śrīdharaḥ : yasmān mokṣa eva paramaḥ puruṣārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1184: kāmāt kordhāc codbhavati yo vego mano-netrādi-kṣobhādi-lakṣaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1185: tam ihaiva tad-uttara-samaya eva yo naraḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1186: soḍhuṃ pratiroddhuṃ śaknoti, tad api na kṣaṇa-mātram |
GE07bhg4c05u:1189: ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa eva yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ sukhī ca bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1191: yad vā maraṇād ūrdhvaṃ vilapantībhir yuvatībhir āliṅgyamāno 'pi putrādibhir dahyamāno 'pi
GE07bhg4c05u:1192: prāṇa-śūnyaḥ kāma-krodha-vegaṃ sahate tathā maraṇāt prāg api jīvann eva yaḥ sahate sa eva yuktaḥ sukhī cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1194: prāṇe gate yathā dehaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na vindati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1195: tathā cet prāṇa-yukto 'pi sa kaivalyāśrayo bhavet || iti ||23||
GE07bhg4c05u:1197: śreyo-mārga-pratipakṣaḥ kaṣṭatamo doṣo mahatā yatnena mumukṣuṇā nivāraṇīya
GE07bhg4c05u:1200: sukha-hetuṣu dṛśyamāneṣu smaryamāṇeṣu vā tad-guṇānusandhānābhyāsena yo
GE07bhg4c05u:1201: raty-ātmako gardho 'bhilāṣas tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ sa kāmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1204: etad-abhilāṣeṇa kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobha ity atra dhana-tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1205: strī-vyatikara-tṛṣṇā kāma iti kāma-lobhau pṛthag uktau |
GE07bhg4c05u:1206: iha tu tṛṣṇā-sāmānyābhiprāyeṇa kāma-śabdaḥ prayukta iti lobhaḥ pṛthaṅ noktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1207: evam ātmanaḥ pratikūleṣu duḥkha-hetuṣu dṛśyamāneṣu śrūyamāṇeṣu vā
GE07bhg4c05u:1208: tad-doṣānusandhānābhyāsena yaḥprajvalanātmako dveṣo manyuḥ sa krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1211: yathā hi nadyā vego varṣāsv atiprabalatayā
GE07bhg4c05u:1212: loka-veda-virodha-pratisandhānenānicchantam api garte pātayitvā majjayati cādho nayati ca, tathā kāma-krodhayor vego viṣayābhidhyānābhyāsena varṣā-kāla-sthānīyenātiprabalo loka-veda-virodha-pratisandhānenānicchantam
GE07bhg4c05u:1213: api viṣaya-garte pātayitvā saṃsāra-samudre majjayati cādho mahā-narakān
GE07bhg4c05u:1221: kartuṃ śaknoti samartho bhavati, sa eva yukto yogī, sa eva sukhī, sa eva naraḥ pumān puruṣārtha-sampādanāt
GE07bhg4c05u:1224: ā-śarīra-vimokṣaṇād ity atrānyad vyākhyānam - yathā maraṇād ūrdhvaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1226: prāṇa-śūnyatvāt kāma-krodha-vegaṃ sahate, tathā maraṇāt prāg api jīvann eva yaḥ sahate sa yukta ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c05u:1230: prāṇe gate yathā dehaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na vindati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1231: tathā cet prāṇa-yukto 'pi sa kaivalyāśrame vaset || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1232: iha tūpannayoḥ kāma-krodhayor vega-sahane prastute tayor anutpatti-mātraṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1234: viśvanāthaḥ : saṃsāra-sindhau patito 'py eṣa eva yogī eṣa eva sukhīty āha śaknotīti ||23||
GE07bhg4c05u:1235: baladevaḥ : śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīra-vimokṣaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1236: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c05u:1240: śrīdhara : na kevalaṃ kāma-krodha-vega-saṃharaṇa-mātreṇa mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1244: antar evārāma ākrīḍā yasya na bahiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1248: sa evaṃ brahmaṇi bhūtaḥ sthitaḥ san brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam adhigacchati prāpnoti ||24||
GE07bhg4c05u:1249: madhusūdanaḥ : kāma-krodha-vega-sahana-mātreṇaiva mucyante iti na, kintu yo 'ntar iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1250: antar-bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣam eva svarūpa-bhūtaṃ sukhaṃ yasya so
GE07bhg4c05u:1253: bāhya-sukhābhāvas tatrāha antar ātmany eva na tu stry-ādi-viṣaye
GE07bhg4c05u:1254: bāhya-sukha-sādhana ārāma āramaṇaṃ krīḍā yasya so 'ntar-ārāmas
GE07bhg4c05u:1259: yathāntar eva sukhaṃ na bāhyair viṣayais tathāntar evātmani jyotir vijñānaṃ na bāhyair indriyair yasya so
GE07bhg4c05u:1266: ya evaṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇa-sampannaḥ sa yogī samāhito brahma-nirvāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1267: brahma paramānanda-rūpaṃ kalpita-dvaitopaśama-rūpatvena nirvāṇaṃ tad eva,
GE07bhg4c05u:1272: brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1273: avasthiter iti kāśa-kṛtsnaḥ iti nyāyāc ca ||24||
GE07bhg4c05u:1274: viśvanātha - yas tu saṃsārātītas tasya tu brahmānubhava eva sukham ity āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1277: ato 'ntarātmany eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c05u:1278: baladeva - yat prītyā taṃ soḍhuṃ śaktas tad āha yo 'ntar iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1279: antarvartinānubhūtenātmanā sukhaṃ yasya saḥ, tenaivārāmaḥ krīḍā yasya saḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1280: | tasminn eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1292: madhusūdanaḥ : mukti-hetor jñānasya sādhanāntarāṇi vivṛṇvann āha labhanta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1300: etādṛśāś ca dvaitādarśitvena sarva-bhūta-hite ratā hiṃsā-śūnyā brahma-vido
GE07bhg4c05u:1303: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1304: bahu-vacanam, tad yo devānāṃ ity ādi-śruty-uktāniyama-pradarśanārtham
GE07bhg4c05u:1305: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ bahava eva sādhana-siddhā bhavantīty āha labhanta iti
GE07bhg4c05u:1306: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sādhana-siddhā bahava bhavantīty āha labhanta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1318: na dehānta eva teṣāṃ brahmaṇi layaḥ, api tu jīvatām api vartata ity arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c05u:1319: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvaṃ kāma-krodhayor utpannayor api vegaḥ soḍhavya ity uktam adhunā tu tayor utpatti-pratibandha eva kartavya ity āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1323: yatna-śīlānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ viditātmanāṃ sākṣāt-kṛta-paramātmanām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ brahma-nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo vartate nityatvāt,
GE07bhg4c05u:1325: viśvanāthaḥ : jñātas tvaṃ-padārtha-nāma-prāpta-paramātma-jñānānāṃ kiyatā kālena brahma-nirvāṇa-sukhaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1328: sarvato-bhāvenaiva vartata eveti brahma-nirvāṇe tasya naivātivilambam iti
GE07bhg4c05u:1330: baladevaḥ : īdṛśān paramātmāpy anuvartata ity āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1331: yatīnāṃ prayatnavatāṃ tān abhito brahma vartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1334: svāny apatyāni puṣṇanti tathāham api padmaja || iti ||26||
GE07bhg4c05u:1336: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1339: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1340: śrīdharaḥ : sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity ādiṣu yogī mokṣam avāpnotīty uktam
GE07bhg4c05u:1341: | tam eva yogaṃ saṅkṣepeṇāha sparśān iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:1346: cakṣur bhruvor antare bhrū-madhya eva kṛtvātyantaṃ netrayor nimīlane hi nidrayā mano līyate
GE07bhg4c05u:1350: ucchvāsa-niḥśvāsa-rūpeṇa nāsikayor abhyantare carantau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-rodhena samau kṛtvā, kumbhakaṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1351: yad vā prāṇo 'yaṃ yathā na bhair niryāti yathā cāpāno 'ntar na
GE07bhg4c05u:1352: praviśati, kintu nāsā-madhya eva dvāv api yathā caratas tathā mandābhyām
GE07bhg4c05u:1356: mokṣa eva param ayanaṃ prāpyaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c05u:1358: evaṃbhūto yo muniḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta evety arthaḥ ||27-28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1362: adhunā sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity atra sūcitaṃ dhyāna-yogaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1363: samyag-darśana-syāntaraṅga-sādhanaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ sūtra-sthānīyāṃs trīn ślokān āha bhagavān
GE07bhg4c05u:1367: tṛtīyena tu tat-phalaṃ paramātma-jñānam iti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1368: sparśān śabdādīn bāhyān bahir bhavān api śrotrādi-dvārā
GE07bhg4c05u:1369: tat-tad-ākārāntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛttibhir antaḥ-praviṣṭān punar bahir eva kṛtvā
GE07bhg4c05u:1371: yady eta āntarā bhaveyus tadopāya-sahasreṇāpi bahir na syuḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1374: vairāgyeṇa bahir gamanaṃ sambhavatīti vadituṃ bāhyān iti viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1375: tad anena vairāgyam uktvābhyāsam āha cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ kṛtvety anuṣajyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1376: atyanta-nimīlane hi nidrākhyā layātmikā vṛttir ekā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c05u:1377: prasāreṇa tu pramāṇa-viparyaya-viveka-vikalpa-smṛtayaś catasro vikṣepātmikā vṛttayo bhaveyuḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1378: pañcāpi tu vṛttayo niroddhavyā iti ardha-nimīlanena bhrū-madhye cakṣuṣo nidhānam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1379: tathā prāṇāpānau samau tulyāv ūrdhvādho-gati-vicchedena nāsābhyantara-cāriṇau kumbhakeṇa kṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c05u:1380: anenopāyena yatāḥ saṃyatā indriya-mano-buddhayo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1382: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodha iti vīrta-rāga-bhaya-krodha ity atra vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1383: etādṛśo yaḥ saṃnyāsī sadā bhavati mukta eva saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1385: athavā ya etādṛśaḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta eva ||27-28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1393: brahmānubhava-sādhanaṃ jñāna-yogād apy utkṛṣṭatvena ṣaṣṭhādhyāye vaktuṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1396: manasi praviśya ye vartante tān, tasmān manasaḥ sakāśād bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1398: cakṣuṣī ca bhruvor antare madhye kṭvā netrayoḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1399: sampūrṇa-nimīlane nidrayā mano līyata unmīlanena bahiḥ prasarati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1404: baladevaḥ : atha karmaṇā niṣkāmeṇa viśuddha-manāḥ samuditātma-jñānas
GE07bhg4c05u:1405: tad-darśanāya samādhiṃ kuryād iti sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ sūcayann āha sparśān iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1406: sparśā śabdādayo viṣayās te bāhyā eva smṛtāḥ santo manasi praviśanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1407: tāṃs tat-smṛti-parityāgena bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ pratyāhṛtyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1408: bhruvor antare madhye cakṣuś ca kṭvā netrayoḥ saṃnimīlane nidrayā manaso layaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1409: pronmīlane ca bahis tasya prasāraḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1413: etenopāyena yatā ātmāvalokanāya sthāpitā indriyādayo yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1422: suhṛdaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1423: śrīdharaḥ : nanv evam indriyādi-saṃyamana-mātreṇa kathaṃ muktiḥ syāt ? na
GE07bhg4c05u:1424: tan-mātreṇa, kintu jñāna-dvāreṇety āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1425: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva mama bhaktaiḥ samarpitānāṃ yadṛcchayā bhoktāraṃ pālakam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1428: antaryāmiṇaṃ māṃ jñātvā mat-prasādena śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1430: samuccayaḥ krameṇoktaḥ sarvajñaṃ naumi taṃ harim ||
GE07bhg4c05u:1433: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yoga-yuktaḥ kiṃ jñātvā mucyata iti tadāha bhoktāram
GE07bhg4c05u:1435: sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ ca kartṛ-rūpeṇa devatā-rūpeṇa ca bhoktāraṃ bhoga-kartāraṃ pālakam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1437: sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnām api niyantāram |
GE07bhg4c05u:1440: paramārtha-satyaṃ sarvātmānaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ māṃ jñātvātmatvena sākṣātkṛtya śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāroparatiṃ muktim ṛcchati prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1441: tvāṃ paśyann api kathaṃ nāhaṃ mukta ity āśaṅkyānirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:1442: ukta-rūpeṇaiva mama jñānaṃ mukti-kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1448: viśvanāthaḥ : evambhūtasya yogino 'pi jñānina iva bhakty-utthena
GE07bhg4c05u:1449: paramātma-jñānenaiva mokṣa ity āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1451: tapasāṃ ca jñāni-kṛtānāṃ bhoktāraṃ pālayitāram iti karmiṇāṃ jñānināṃ copāsyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1452: sarva-lokānāṃ maheśvaraṃ mahā-niyantāram antaryāminaṃ yoginām upāsyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1454: sva-bhakty-upadeśena hita-kāriṇam iti bhaktānām upāsyaṃ māṃ jñātveti sattva-guṇa-maya-jñānena nirguṇasya mamānubhavāsambhavāt bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti mad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1455: nirguṇayā bhaktyaiva yogī svopāsyaṃ paramātmānaṃ mām aparokṣānubhava-gocarīkṛtya śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1460: baladevaḥ : evaṃ samādhi-sthaḥ kṛta-svātmāvalokanaḥ paramātmānam upāsyam ucyata ity āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1463: tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ [ŚvetU 6.7] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1465: īdṛśaṃ māṃ jñātvā svārādhyatayānubhūya śāntiṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttim ṛcchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1466: sarveśvarasya suhṛdaś ca samārādhanaṃ khalu sukhāvahaṃ sukha-sādhanam iti ||29||
